nodes.text: Kaavo was a type of food that had a crust and contained meat and cheese. Around the time of the end of the Clone Wars, on the planet Cularin, the Human Sal, the Rodian Renna and the Wookiee Ooorlak shared a kaavo that had been prepared by the chef Val-Aruun. Soon there was only one slice left and in order to decide who would get to eat it, the trio decided to each tell a story about the death of a loved one and to give the slice of kaavo to the person who told their story best. Afterwards, they couldn't decide who had won and instead, they planned to leave the slice at the Wall of Remembrance.
